translations: 过敏；超敏感性（hypersensitive 的名词）

sentences.sentence: PURPOSE: to study and evaluate the effect preventing dentine hypersensitiveness by using Fluor Protector or Green OrTM on the prepared vital pulp abutment teeth of PFM Bridges.
sentences.translation: 目的：评价氟保护剂和极固宁TM对烤瓷冠桥活髓基牙预备后牙本质过敏症的防治效果。
